channel.title: Cakebuild on One Problem Solved
channel.description: Recent content in Cakebuild on One Problem Solved

item.title: First Build Flow With Cakebuild
item.description: Problem: Development Builds Took Too Much Work to Configure For a .NET application I work on, I wanted to have a more agile and faster development build and deployment process. Cakebuild had been on my radar, but seeing (person’s) lighting talk at .NET Fringe 2017 on Cakebuild inspired me to give it a try. Cakebuild Cakebuild is a cross-platform open source build system, driven by build scripts which use a C# domain-specific language.
